body_content.explanation: the state of not being able to produce plants or fruit:
examples: A short drive through the countryside reveals vast swathes of barrenness.
The city gives way to sprawling ranchos, then barrenness.

body_content.explanation: the condition of not being able to have children or young animals:
examples: Infertility treatment promises to overcome barrenness.

body_content.explanation: the fact of being empty or without anything new or creative:
examples: He dreaded a life of barrenness and isolation.
All his talent can't disguise the barrenness of the screenplay.
